passes.description: Ensure the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > section:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > section:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h3
